thread.title: Hillary Clinton Isn’t the Only Threat to High-Priced Drugs
thread.title_full: Hillary Clinton Isn’t the Only Threat to High-Priced Drugs - WSJ

author: Charley Grant
title: Hillary Clinton Isn’t the Only Threat to High-Priced Drugs
text:
Drug stocks can be at risk when high prices draw the wrath of politicians. But the competition these prices invite can be just as problematic for investors.
Hillary Clinton sent drug stocks tumbling Monday with a statement on Twitter promising to reveal a plan to combat high drug prices. Her tweet came in the wake of news that closely held Turing Pharmaceuticals had purchased the right to a decades-old drug used to treat... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
